# SCREEN SETTING

## Q MENU BACKGROUND

Choose the background color used for the quick menu when it is displayed during still photography.

| Options     |
|-------------|
| TRANSPARENT |
| BLACK       |

## Q MENU BACKGROUND

Choose the background color used for the quick menu when it is displayed during movie recording.

| Options     |
|-------------|
| TRANSPARENT |
| BLACK       |
